metadata.title: CVE-2019-13672 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in Omnibox in Google Chrome prior to 77.0.3865.75allowed a remote attacker to potentially spoof the contents of the Omnibox(URL bar) via a crafted HTML page on iOS.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
